title: pretextview step not working in GAP_hic_map7
body: Not working due to the .sam format that is output from `chromap`. Try to use a .pairs format instead.

title: remove the fasta file from the output directory containing cool/mcool files. it has things named by JBAT
remove seaborn dependencies
body: it causes too many problems, with GAP_annotate_miniprot for example

title: remove pretextmap from hic_map7 or implement pairs
body: pretextmap now uses pairs as well, change to use this

title: GAP_sort_scaffolds_by_hic_insert drops scaffolds
body: Some of the scaffolds disappear, presumably because they lack Hi-C data

title: make a chromap install snakemake script
remove pysam dependency - add fasta
body: There is a dependency on pysam in `bin/assembly-from-fasta.py`, remove the dependency and replace it with a prepackaged fasta parser

title: max-threads vs cores
body:
In principle either should work. The usage of both is just to specify the maximum number of threads that should be used for SMPs, while most other things are limited to one thread.

One improvement could be to make these redundant through a runtime check to set whichever of this is present to a global variable within each snakemake script.

title: check if zlib is installed for chromap
body: currently fails if zlib is not installed.
